abstract: Kabel Deutschland said on Monday that it had received a preliminary takeover bid by John Malone’s Liberty Global, setting up a potential bidding war for the German cable operator.
snippet: Kabel Deutschland said on Monday that it had received a preliminary takeover bid by John Malone’s Liberty Global, setting up a potential bidding war for the German cable operator.
lead_paragraph: Kabel Deutschland said on Monday that it had received a preliminary takeover bid by John C. Malone’s Liberty Global, setting up a potential bidding war for the German cable operator.

headline.main: Kabel Deutschland Discloses Takeover Approach by Liberty Global

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
